item.description:
Mark C. is hosting this event

It’s a “2 fer” once again! Join your fellow Sitzers and friends at the brunch at the Gaslight restaurant (where the Prix Fix Menu of $9.95 will get you a choice of 3 entrees, 2 juices, coffee or tea & a sweet a la Julia Child!) …or order off the regular menu…try the Gaslight Bloody Mary– delicious! Enjoy the food, the ambience & the conversations….you are guaranteed to leave with a smile!

Each guest pays the server! Paypal is NOT availale for this event.

FREE Parking is adjacent to the restaurant!

RSVPs are appreciated! Limited to 20!

Many may then proceed to the South End Markets where fresh fruit & veggies, breads & jams, flowers and everything one could wish for are available in the Farmer’s Market. A few steps away are many quality vendors with crafts, arts, clothes, jewlery and the famous Food Trucks!

It’s a beautiful day in the South End!

Lost? Call 978.314.5371 Mark
item.how_to_find_us: You won't be able to miss us!
item.name: Sunday Brunch at the Gaslight
